title: House still bank
description: golden brown wood; black outlined curved door with black handle;  orange arch with orange/gold arch outline door; two black outlined windows with orange and orange/gold enclose windows on front; similar windows on each side; window outlined on top and bottom in orange with black outlined shutters located near roof\'s peak both sides;  diamond shaped shingles on roof; chimney with long narrow wood; black cat on front; light gold trees inlaid each side of frame; all windows but one with green curtains; coin slot on roof front; base with two black lines in front;
